由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】
祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.3.0.15 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. Since I haven't updated it for a long time, I just help to update and optimize it. [the production of this sight has been approved by the original author]

Due to some changes in the sight scale of some top-level vehicles in the new version, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, ple...

This sight was made by remodeling it.

https://live.warthunder.com/post/752172/en/

This work only centurion mk.5 AVRE

The middle reticle is for zeroing.

The small circle reticle on the right is for the aim.

#avre #centurion_mk5 #centurion_mk5_avre #custom_sights

Vanilla reticle has been fixed.

This custom reticle is no longer accurate

Прицел "Точка" для танков ВМВ с ручным дальномером.(Могут быть проблемы совместимости на ТОПОВЫХ танках)/"Dot" sight for WWII tanks with handy rangefinder (May it will be problems of compatibility on TOP TIER tanks)
Универсальный прицел для топовых танков/Universal sight for top tier tanks.

M3 Bradley Sight- 10KB - Enjoy. :D
Download it, If you like it. :D

#M3Bradley #M3 #Bradley

Прицел "Точка" с ручным дальномером. Прицел универсален тем, что подходит большинству технике в игре.
"Dot" sight with handy rangefinder. This sight fits for most of the tanks in game.
Универсальный прицел "Точка"/ Universal "Dot" sight

So, this is guide how i make my sights. Mostly for sim, but arcade\rb works the same, but easier

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFB3nz6hlMM

#guide #гайд #sight

Custom sights for top apfsds shells on the M1128, M1Abrams, IPM1, M1KVT, M1A1, M1A1HC, M1A1AIM, M1A1USMC, M1A2, M1A2SEP, M1A2SEP2, Leopard2A4, Leopard2A4MCAN, Leopard2A5, Leopard2A5PSO, Leopard2PL, Leopard2A6, Leopard2A7V, Leopard2A4pzbtl, Strv121, Strv121BChristianII, Strv122, Strv122B, Strv122B+

Install instructions:
Extract .zip file to War Thunder/Usersights
That's it, Enjoy!

#M1128 #M1Abrams #IPM1 #M...
Для тех кто не любит линии на весь экран!/ For those that dont like lines along the screen!

Need Naval rangefinder optics similar to coincidence rangefinder or a stereoscopic telemeter that
allows control of the sighting image by mouse wheel or arrow keys to align a split image to the range of the target.
The existing method is sometime a guess at distance.

Eyepiece image of a naval rangefinder, showing the displaced image when not yet adjusted for range

https://thomascsanger.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/perisocpe.jpg
Универсальный, облегченный прицел/Universal, light sight.

fictional,
sight request for the T72B3 2011
horizontal grid is pure eyecandy

left vertical grid is 600m, 800m, 1000m, 1400m, 2300m for apdsfs
right grid is 200m, 400m, 600m, 800m for HE

Historical* sight grid Turmzielfernrohr 38(t) Bild 4 and Bild 5 for Pz.38(t) and Pz.35(t).
*as is possible in War Thunder

Comments

  • This is a remaster of the old grid ( https://live.warthunder.com/post/790867 ), that doesn't work send 'em to the moon now. The scale of the main gun changes to display the ballistics of the loaded shell.
  • Scale on the right is for the coaxial machine gun, above the scale is icon of the coaxial machine gun.
  • On the left - for the main gun, above it the icon of the main gun.
  • In the grid "Bild 5" has triangles wi...

Hello!
Non-historical sight for Type90 tank.

Origin from korean K-2 black panther.


If you want korean one, use "type90_K"
and "type90_E" is for english


#type90

Have a nice game!
